name: Ventreville: A Cure for Sorrow
storyline:
Ventreville: A Cure for Sorrow is a fantasy visual novel game with a colorful cast of playable characters, each with their own unique mechanics, and all of whom are necessary in solving this mystery. But be careful, as your choices will determine whether their stories end in ruin or victory.

Start as Orven Zanry, an up-and-coming glassblower working for the esteemed Ret Avidine. Work to uncover the secrets of “Remedium,” the cure to the plague destroying the city of Ventreville. And as you learn more about the remedy, your hero, and your coworkers, realize that things are not as they seem…
summary: Determine the fate of Ventreville, a city plagued by sickness and secrets. Play as six protagonists with unique abilities as you interrogate and outwit suspects, hide from enemies, crack puzzles, and even call the Gods for help! What are you willing to risk to find the truth?
